General.Name: Anhui Huaqi Environmental Protection Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Anhui Huaqi Environmental Protection & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the water environment management business in China. It is also involved in the water environment engineering design, general engineering contracting, project investment and operation, intelligent environmental protection equipment, and ecological environment materials activities. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Maanshan, China.
